data.apiNameCn: 电子行程单开具（冲红）预览RPT
data.introduce: 用户调用接口实现电子行程单的开具及红冲实现预览功能。开具预览完成返回 请求批次号、请求行程单信息、机票号码。
data.business: 电子行程单开具/冲红预览
data.functions: 电子行程单开具/冲红预览
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"buyer","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方信息","children":[{"name":"taxpayerId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方纳税人识别号","children":[]},{"name":"name","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方名称","children":[]},{"name":"type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方类型 0：企业 1：机关或事业单位 2：个人 3：其他","children":[]},{"name":"address","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方地址","children":[]},{"name":"telephoneNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方电话号码","children":[]},{"name":"bankName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方银行名称","children":[]},{"name":"bankAccount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"购买方银行账号","children":[]}]},{"name":"issueType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"开票类型 0：蓝票 1：红票：0","children":[]},{"name":"method","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"开票方式：0：合并开具 1：拆分开具 如不传入默 认为0","children":[]},{"name":"office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"开票OFFICE ，需要与系统登录用户OFFICE保持一 致。：BJS000","children":[]},{"name":"ticketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"机票号码：9102213973277 最大长度20","children":[]}]
data.responseSchema:
[ {
  "name" : "code",
  "type" : "string",
  "quantity" : "0..1",
  "description" : "返回状态",
  "children" : [ ],
  "default" : ""
}, {
